Cheltenham Festival 2015 - Festival Novices Handicap Chase

The Festival Novices Handicap Chase is a relatively new race at the Cheltenham Festival having previously been known as the Jewson novices Handicap. The race is run over two and a half miles and is always a competitive race for punters to enjoy on the first day of the Festival. In 2013, we had a good winner in the form of Rajdhani Express who claimed the win for connections at a good price of 16/1.
